articles.author: Gill Clark
articles.title: Ruben Neves heading to Al-Hilal not Barcelona this summer - Barca Blaugranes
articles.content:
Ruben Neves has regularly been linked with a move to Barcelona over the last few months but appears to be heading to Saudi Arabia instead.
Multiple reports are claiming Wolves have agreed a whopping… [+787 chars]

articles.author: Filip Cleeren
articles.title: Villeneuve hits out at abuse over Leclerc F1 helmet tribute - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Jacques Villeneuve has hit out at the abuse he received over the dispute surrounding Charles Leclerc using his father's helmet design at Formula 1's Canadian Grand Prix.
articles.content:
On Friday, Leclerc revealed a tribute helmet sporting the iconic red and black colour scheme used by former Ferrari driver Gilles Villeneuve, after whom the Canadian Grand Prix venue was named.
But … [+1942 chars]
